comment.author: 57936521@N03
comment._content:
My cousin, Cecil Glen Taylor was killed on the USS Louisville when struck by a kamkazi Jan 26, 1945.  If you have any information regarding this attack I would appreciate a comment.

M Neal

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: Sorry, we don't, but this site looks like it does have much info: navymemorial.ibelong.com/site/USS-Louisville-CA-28
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
